mapper.select: select count(*) from qm_review where user_id=#{userId} and office_id=#{officeId}
select o.office_name, r.review_star, r.review_data, r.review_id from qm_office o, qm_review r where o.office_id = r.office_id and r.review_id = #{review_id}
select o.office_name, r.review_star, r.review_data, r.review_id from qm_office o, qm_review r where o.user_id = r.user_id and r.office_id = #{office_id}
select o.office_name, r.review_star, r.review_data, r.review_reg, r.review_id from qm_office o, qm_review r where o.office_id = r.office_id and r.user_id = #{user_id} order by r.review_reg desc

select review_id, office_id, r.user_id, review_reg, review_data, review_star, user_nick from qm_review r, qm_user u where r.user_id = u.user_id and office_id = #{officeId} order by (case when user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 0 else 1 end), review_reg desc
select review_id, office_id, r.user_id, review_reg, review_data, review_star, user_nick from qm_review r, qm_user u where r.user_id = u.user_id and office_id = #{officeId} order by review_reg desc
mapper.insert: insert into qm_review (office_id, user_id, review_reg, review_data, review_star) values(#{office_id}, #{user_id}, #{review_reg}, #{review_data}, #{review_star})
mapper.update: update qm_review set review_star=#{review_star}, review_data=#{review_data} where review_id=#{review_id}
